The plot shows a red heart.

```{r heart plot}
data <- data.frame(t=seq(0, 2*pi, by=0.1) )
xfun <- function(t) 16*sin(t)^3
yfun <- function(t) 13*cos(t)-5*cos(2*t)-2*cos(3*t)-cos(4*t)
data$y <- yfun(data$t)
data$x <- xfun(data$t)

plot(data$x,data$y, type="l", col="red", lty=2, axes=F, ylab="", xlab="")
```


```{r interesting find} 

x <- rnorm(100, 2, 0.5)
y <- rnorm(100, 50, 0.4)
plot(x)
abline(lm(x~y))
points(y,x, col="red")

1337
```
